title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from a tyrannical warlord.

title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends try to enjoy their remaining days before graduation, planning a party to impress girls.

title: The Hangover
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Hereditary
description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences, unraveling dark secrets about their ancestry.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Notebook
description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

title: La La Land
description: While pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, a jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love but struggle to maintain their relationship.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry and uncovers the truth about his magical heritage and the dark past of his parents.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit embarks on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring, aided by a fellowship of friends and allies.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the founding of Facebook, exploring the lawsuits, betrayals, and relationships that shaped the social media empire.

title: Whiplash
description: A young jazz drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his dreams are mentored by an abusive instructor.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American man uncovers a disturbing secret when he meets the family of his white girlfriend.

title: A Quiet Place
description: A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of the future leader of the human resistance.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A reprogrammed terminator protects a young boy from a more advanced cyborg assassin sent from the future.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions — Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness — conflict on how best to navigate a new city and school.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre's quiet life is disrupted when numerous fairy tale characters are exiled to his swamp by the scheming Lord Farquaad.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing paths with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and crime, creating the infamous Joker persona.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated cannibal killer to catch another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship with tragic results, seeking to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, training a new generation of graduates for a dangerous mission.

title: The Hunger Games
description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in a televised fight to the death between teens in a dystopian future.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and people.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class.

title: Crazy Rich Asians
description: Native New Yorker Rachel Chu accompanies her boyfriend to his best friend's wedding in Singapore and meets his ultra-rich family.

title: Moana
description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse reaches her island, Moana sets sail to find the demigod Maui and save her people.

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice, her kingdom is trapped in eternal winter and her sister sets off to find her.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer, and unlocks his family's history.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he’s poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and become the Black Panther.

title: Doctor Strange
description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Wonder Woman
description: Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves her home to stop World War I, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

title: Aquaman
description: Arthur Curry, heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, must step forward to claim his birthright and prevent a war between land and sea.

title: Shazam!
description: A 14-year-old boy can transform into an adult superhero by uttering the magic word 'Shazam!' and must learn to use his newfound powers responsibly.

title: The Flash
description: Barry Allen gains super-speed abilities and must harness them to protect his city from evil forces and time-related disasters.

title: Iron Man
description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, and philanthropist Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor to escape captivity and becomes Iron Man.

title: Captain America
description: After being enhanced to the peak of human perfection, Steve Rogers fights for justice as the patriotic superhero Captain America.

title: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans on Earth, learning humility and heroism.

title: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang, a former thief, acquires a suit that allows him to shrink in size but increase in strength, becoming the superhero Ant-Man.

title: Deadpool
description: A former special forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to an experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor.

title: Logan
description: In the near future, an aging Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X while protecting a young mutant from dark forces.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the remaining Avengers assemble to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies must stop Thanos from collecting all six Infinity Stones and unleashing his destructive plan on the universe.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker balances high school life with being Spider-Man while facing the Vulture, a villain threatening New York City.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe but must step up as Spider-Man to face a new threat, Mysterio.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while unraveling the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens the multiverse, leading to unforeseen consequences and new threats.

title: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

title: Eternals
description: A group of immortal beings with superhuman powers emerges from hiding to protect humanity from the Deviants.

title: The Batman
description: Batman ventures into Gotham’s underworld when a killer leaves cryptic clues, uncovering corruption that connects to his own family.

title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game and must work together to survive its deadly challenges.

title: Jumanji: The Next Level
description: The gang returns to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, facing even more dangerous terrain and unexpected twists.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes must save the world while maintaining their normal suburban lives.

title: The Incredibles 2
description: Elastigirl is called to lead a campaign to bring Supers back, while Mr. Incredible navigates domestic life at home.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat with a passion for cooking teams up with a young chef in Paris to create culinary masterpieces.

title: Up
description: An elderly man fulfills a lifelong dream by tying thousands of balloons to his house and flying to South America, accompanied by a young boy scout.

title: Wall-E
description: A small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will decide the fate of mankind.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A robotics prodigy teams up with his inflatable robot and friends to form a high-tech superhero team.

title: Zootopia
description: A rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox work together to uncover a conspiracy in a city of anthropomorphic animals.

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: An overweight panda discovers he is the prophesied Dragon Warrior and must defend the Valley of Peace.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
description: Po and the Furious Five must stop a villain who plans to conquer China using a secret weapon of mass destruction.

title: Kung Fu Panda 3
description: Po reunites with his long-lost father and faces a supernatural villain who threatens Kung Fu mastery.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking befriends a dragon, changing the way his village perceives the creatures.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
description: Hiccup discovers a secret ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and faces a new villain.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
description: Hiccup and Toothless discover a hidden dragon utopia while facing a dragon hunter who threatens their world.

title: Madagascar
description: A group of zoo animals find themselves stranded on the island of Madagascar after a zoo escape.

title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
description: The zoo animals continue their adventures as they travel to Africa and meet their wild relatives.

title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
description: The animals join a traveling circus as they try to return home to New York City.

title: Ice Age
description: A group of prehistoric animals come together to return a human baby to its tribe.

title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
description: The ice is melting, and Manny, Sid, and Diego must save their herd from disaster.

title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
description: The herd discovers a hidden world of dinosaurs beneath the ice and must rescue Sid.

title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
description: Manny and the herd set sail on an adventure after their continent breaks apart.

title: Ice Age: Collision Course
description: The herd must save the Earth from a meteor strike with the help of Scrat.

title: Despicable Me
description: A supervillain adopts three girls as part of his evil plan, only to change his ways.

title: Despicable Me 2
description: Gru teams up with the Anti-Villain League to stop a new supervillain threat.

title: Despicable Me 3
description: Gru discovers he has a long-lost twin and faces a villainous threat with his Minions.
